how do i mount an .ISO file?
you tell it what files it is.  you type in the command line sudo mount -t iso9660 -o loop filename.iso /mnt
filename.iso = whatever the file's name is
in the command line type sudo apt-get install wine
after it's installed you run the .exe file from the command line....  wine filename.exe
because windows comes pre-installed on most computers.
